title: Microsoft Teams: Facilitator agent notetaking in meetings and chats
description: The Facilitator agent takes real-time notes during your Teams meetings and chats. It synthesizes key information from the conversations, so you can catch up quickly. In meetings, it allows everyone to co-author and collaborate seamlessly. In chat, the Facilitator creates and maintains an up-to-date summary of important information as the conversation happens, including key decisions, actions items, and open questions to resolve.
